Subject: Cloud Hosted upgrade to 5.9.4.1
Description:
Following you recent article below it has been advised that we upgrade to EPP v5.9.4.1

Please advise how we can achieve this as a cloud hosted client?
Will we also require our clients to be upgraded to the latest revision as well?

Thank You in advance
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c: To upgrade the server version from Live Update.
What_We_Know__c:
The scheduled Update did not go through.
I have asked him to cancel the scheduled one, and to perform it manually.
Next_Steps__c: Check for updates, and apply them
Solution_Comment__c: Successfully applied the 5.9.4.0 patch from Live update.
